title: Two Sum
description: Given an array of integers (`nums`) and a target sum, return the indices of the two numbers that add up to the target. Assume exactly one solution exists.
constraints: Input is a list of integers.
Output must be a list of two indices.
hints: A brute-force solution is O(n^2), which is too slow.
Use a hash map (dictionary in Python) to store the value and its index. This reduces complexity to O(n).
